text: meet the men and the boys defending
Aidan volunteer fighters trying to block
the Houthi rebel advance with a little
help from the local stimulant cart they
told me the Houthis are northern
invaders who have no place here in the
south I'm ready to die for this says
Ahmed Nasser who's 18 they came here to
fight us on our land we didn't go there
to fight them and they insist Yemen must
be divided again north and south as it
was before 1990 there's no room for
unity says Gaffin Haider the salesman
everyone should go to their own land no
compromises no middle ground
no Federation then a few fighters headed
out on their quad bikes no match for
Houthi tanks across town more volunteers
man a checkpoint at the entrance to Al
kahl√∫a a frontline neighborhood
the Houthis aren't far away this belief
one two three flaws acromial Foos a
social worker tells me locals are
outgoing but the Houthis won't take
these streets it's true we haven't heavy
ribbons but the heavy weapons and the
strong movements in our chests he can't
enter here
further up the Main Street the danger
zone
well this is the last area under the
control of the local resistance fighters
and they've asked us not to go any
further forward now just around the
corner there are some high-rise
buildings they say there are Houthi
snipers there and they've been firing in
this direction just a few hours ago
across the road there is one final
checkpoint held by the local fighters
the Houthis are just ahead they say the
distance is just a hundred yards then a
moment of chaos when the fighters tried
to stop a car turning the corner and
suddenly pointed their guns at us we
took cover and when they heard we were
journalists they apologized soon we were
hearing the soundtrack of war
the death toll is rising here though
locals have learned to move fast less
than last night we are going to the most
Mosca's here after these buildings rang
this because I had to keep safe from man
to man we will kill them but the snipers
and you know keeping tip safe in high
building and shoot on us we don't know
from where at the harbour one of the
latest casualties of the conflict is
evacuated for treatment another fighter
fresh from battle in what's been called
the DIY defense of a city orna Garin BBC
